sentence.text: Mucopolysaccharidosis VI (MPS-VI) is an infrequent autosomal recessive disorder caused by mutations in regulation of epithelial cell migration gene and deficiency in lysosomal enzyyme ARSB activities subsequently.
Here we report a novel missense mutation in regulation of epithelial cell migration gene that is inherited as an autosomal recessive mode and probably explain the clinical status of the proband.
